p: In the case of Mexico, the National Movement of Producers and agroecology organizations decided to engage in the national dialogues to, particularly, strengthen a recently approved decree aiming to gradually prohibit the use of glyphosate in agriculture. Large corporations in Mexico undermined the prohibition of glyphosate by asking for this decree to be fixed. Therefore, the civil society organizations felt the need to participate in the national dialogues and reinforce their positions, support the decree, and move forward.
